name: UNIONTOWN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD in Behalf of UNIONTOWN AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION and Yolanda S. Defino. Petition of UNIONTOWN AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION and Yolanda S. Defino
name_abbreviation: Uniontown Area School District v. Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board ex rel. Uniontown Area Education Ass'n

parties: UNIONTOWN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD in Behalf of UNIONTOWN AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION and Yolanda S. Defino. Petition of UNIONTOWN AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION and Yolanda S. Defino.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW this 19th day of February, 1998, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the issue of whether PERA covers a union employee who applies for a non-promotion, management position outside the bargaining unit.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
705 A.2d 1296
UNIONTOWN AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD in Behalf of UNIONTOWN AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION and Yolanda S. Defino. Petition of UNIONTOWN AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION and Yolanda S. Defino.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 19, 1998.
